message.content: {"given_definition_quality":45,"better_definition":"right away; immediately","sentence":"我们马上下课。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation style illustration showing a classroom with a digital clock displaying the time, students and a teacher preparing to leave, books closing, and a subtle glowing light coming from the doorway, evoking an urgent but soft mood as if everyone is about to leave right away.","sentence_translation":"We finish class right away."}
